Wisdom: بِئْسَ الزَّادُ إِلَى الْمَعَادِ الْعُدْوَانُ عَلَى الْعِبَادِ
enWisdom: How evil a provision for the Hereafter is oppressiveness to the servants [of Allah]!

Wisdom: ظُلْمُ الْمَرْءِ فِي الدُّنْيَا عُنْوَانُ شَقَائِهِ فِي الْآخِرَةِ
enWisdom: The injustice of a man in this world is the symbol of his wretchedness in the Hereafter

Wisdom: لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِالْمَعَادِ مَنْ لَا يَتَحَرَّجُ عَنْ ظُلْمِ الْعِبَادِ
enWisdom: He who does not refrain from oppressing people does not believe in the Hereafter
